definition: "hanging" river (an embanked one whose riverbed is higher than the surrounding floodplain)/(literary) waterfall/cataract/(fig.) torrent of words
to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation

sentences.english: A flow of phrases is no proof of wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 口若懸河，無所不能證明真有才智。

sentences.english: He made a speech straight off the reel without stumbling over a word.
sentences.chinese: 他口若懸河，一字不頓地發表了了演講。

sentences.english: Eloquence helps her to handle with the business.
sentences.chinese: 口若懸河對她做生意很有幫助。

sentences.english: He speaks volubly like a flowing river; many people are attracted to stop and listen.
sentences.chinese: 他口若懸河，侃侃而談，吸引了不少人聽。
